metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5170 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In canvas rendering, a compromised content process could have caused asurface to change unexpectedly, leading to a memory leak of a privilegedprocess. This memory leak could be used to effect a sandbox escape if thecorrect data was leaked. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 118.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
